tasks.title: Build ADS Engine (adt_core/ads/)
tasks.description: Extract and generalize Safe Logger from OceanPulse _cortex/ops/log.py. Implement logger.py, integrity.py, schema.py, query.py. Must work independently of any specific project.

tasks.title: Build SDD Engine (adt_core/sdd/)
tasks.description: Implement spec lifecycle management: registry.py (DRAFT→APPROVED→COMPLETED), validator.py (spec-action authorization), tasks.py (task tracking). Read specs from configurable project path.

tasks.title: Build DTTP Gateway (adt_core/dttp/)
tasks.description: Implement privilege-separated enforcement gateway per SPEC-014. gateway.py (request validation), jurisdictions.py (role-path mapping), actions.py (local/SSH/FTP handlers), policy.py (fail-closed engine).

tasks.title: Build Operational Center Flask App (adt_center/)
tasks.description: Implement Flask application per SPEC-015. Dashboard, ADS Timeline, Spec Registry (with approve buttons), Task Board, DTTP Monitor. Human web UI + agent API endpoints.

tasks.title: Build Help & Principles Page (adt_center/templates/about.html)
tasks.description: Implement the ADT Help page per SPEC-016. All 12 sections: What is ADT, Four Pillars, ADS, Integrity Chain, SDD, DTTP, Operational Center, Roles, Narrative Workflows, Real Incidents, Glossary, Roadmap.

tasks.title: Build Agent SDK (adt_sdk/)
tasks.description: Implement client library for AI agents. ADTClient class, decorators (@adt.authorized, @adt.logged), hook templates for Claude and Gemini CLI.

tasks.title: Write tests for all core modules
tasks.description: Unit tests for ADS, SDD, DTTP engines. Integration test for full request flow: agent SDK → DTTP gateway → action + ADS log.

tasks.title: SPEC-018 Phase A: Security fixes (path traversal, path matching)
tasks.description: Fix path traversal in actions.py, fix path matching bypass in jurisdictions.py and policy.py.

tasks.title: SPEC-018 Phase B: Shared hash, hardcoded names, config population
tasks.description: Extract hash to crypto.py, remove hardcoded project names, populate specs.json and jurisdictions.json, add stale cache fix to validator.

tasks.title: SPEC-019: Create standalone DTTP service (service.py + config.py)
tasks.description: Create adt_core/dttp/service.py (Flask app on :5002) and adt_core/dttp/config.py. Three endpoints: POST /request, GET /status, GET /policy.

tasks.title: SPEC-019: Refactor Operational Center to use DTTP over HTTP
tasks.description: Remove in-process DTTP imports from adt_center/app.py. Update dttp_routes.py to proxy to DTTP service. Dashboard reads DTTP status via GET /status.

tasks.title: SPEC-019: Update Agent SDK to point at DTTP service
tasks.description: Change ADTClient default URL from Operational Center to DTTP service (localhost:5002). Add get_policy() method.

tasks.title: SPEC-019: Integration tests for DTTP service
tasks.description: 26 tests covering: approved/denied requests, all 3 endpoints, path traversal, jurisdiction boundary, ADS logging verification, input validation.

tasks.title: SPEC-020: Add sovereign path check to gateway.py
tasks.description: Hardcode SOVEREIGN_PATHS list in gateway.py (config/specs.json, config/jurisdictions.json, config/dttp.json, _cortex/AI_PROTOCOL.md, _cortex/MASTER_PLAN.md). Check resolved paths against this list BEFORE any spec/jurisdiction validation. Reject with reason 'sovereign_path_violation'. Log with tier: 1, escalation: true.

tasks.title: SPEC-020: Add constitutional path check to gateway.py
tasks.description: Hardcode CONSTITUTIONAL_PATHS list in gateway.py (gateway.py, policy.py, service.py, logger.py, integrity.py, crypto.py). For Tier 2 paths: require authorizing spec explicitly lists the file (not directory wildcard), require tier2_justification in request. Deny with reason 'tier2_authorization_required' if missing. Log with tier: 2.

tasks.title: SPEC-020: Extend ADS event schema with tier field and new action types
tasks.description: Add optional 'tier' field (1/2/3) to ADS event schema. Add new action types: sovereign_path_violation, tier2_authorized, tier2_denied, break_glass, break_glass_audit. Update schema.py validation to accept these.

tasks.title: SPEC-020: Write self-governance tests
tasks.description: Tests: sovereign path rejection (all 5 paths, any role/spec), Tier 2 elevation (require explicit file + justification), Tier 2 denial (missing justification), break-glass event logging with agent HUMAN, path list immutability (modifying gateway.py requires Tier 2 auth). Minimum 8 test functions.

tasks.title: SPEC-020: Document Overseer audit procedure for break-glass and Tier 2 events
tasks.description: Write documentation for the Overseer role describing: how to identify break-glass events in ADS, how to review Tier 2 changes, checklist for break-glass audit (event logged, hash chain valid, fix minimal, no unauthorized changes). Store in _cortex/docs/overseer_audit.md.
